episodes.title: 110- Chris Fairbanks
episodes.summary: The always hilarious Chris Fairbanks is finally on The Todd Glass Show!

episodes.title: 109- Tom Martin
episodes.summary: It's a small family show today with Tom Martin! They talk about Ursula, play some music and much more!

episodes.title: 108- Henry Phillips and Troy Conrad
episodes.summary: Henry Phillips and Troy Conrad come hang out for some fun and live music!

episodes.title: 107- Troy Conrad part 2
episodes.summary: It's the second half of the hilarious show with Troy Conrad (co-creator of Set List)!

episodes.title: 106- Troy Conrad
episodes.summary: Troy Conrad (from the amazing Set List show!) hangs out with the gang at Blackhorse Motors!

episodes.title: 105- Andy Dick
episodes.summary: The one and only Andy Dick comes on the show!

episodes.title: 104- Daniel Kinno is back!
episodes.summary: The Todd Glass Show welcomes back fan favorite Daniel Kinno!

episodes.title: 103- James Adomian and Tom Martin part 2
episodes.summary: The second half to last week's episode. Listen to find out what else happened!

episodes.title: 102- James Adomian and Tom Martin
episodes.summary: James Adomian is back on the show! Tom Martin joins too for some bits, impressions and more!

episodes.title: 101- Blake Wexler
episodes.summary: It's fan favorite Blake Wexler on today's show! Lots of laughs, bits and more!

episodes.title: 100- Rory Scovel
episodes.summary: The always hilarious Rory Scovel joins Todd and the gang for the 100th episode!

episodes.title: 99- Tom Martin
episodes.summary: Tom Martin can't get enough of the show! He's back, but this time with Todd. And fun ensues!

episodes.title: 98- Tom Martin and Henry Phillips
episodes.summary: Tom Martin takes over while Todd is out of town and Henry Phillips comes by to have some fun!

episodes.title: 97- John Roberts and Tom Martin
episodes.summary: John Roberts from Bob's Burgers stops by to chat, joke and do some voices! And then there's an after show!!

episodes.title: 96- Eddie Pepitone
episodes.summary: Eddie Pepitone returns to the show for more bits! And some songs with the live in-studio band!

episodes.title: 95- Jake Fogelnest
episodes.summary: Looks like Jake Fogelnest just couldn't get enough of The Todd Glass Show! He's back for more fun!

episodes.title: 94- Family Show
episodes.summary: It's just Chris and Eric, or Erc, on this week's show! Join in on the family fun!

episodes.title: 93- Family Show with Sharif
episodes.summary: It's another episode with the family! And the amazing musician Sharif stopped by to hang out and play some songs!

episodes.title: 92- Family Show part 2
episodes.summary: Last week's show continues! There's more yelling from Blake, and of course more bits!

episodes.title: 91- Family Show
episodes.summary: It's just Todd, Blake and Eric on this family show. Blake yells a bit, they watch some people walk by and much, much more!

episodes.title: 90- Family Show (with Blake Wexler)
episodes.summary: It's just the family on this week's show! But the bits, songs and laugh were in full force!

episodes.title: 89- Tom Martin and Henry Phillips
episodes.summary: Henry Phillips and Tom Martin come on the show to bring the laughs and some songs!

episodes.title: 88- Live from Washington DC!
episodes.summary: It's The Todd Glass Show LIVE from our nation's capital!

episodes.title: 87- Todd and Daniel from a hotel in DC!
episodes.summary: Todd and Daniel are in DC but that doesn't stop them from doing a show!

episodes.title: 86- Paul F. Tompkins and Jen Kirkman
episodes.summary: Holy sh*t, was this episode fun! We laughed, we cried, we sang, we laughed some more. Listen and enjoy!

episodes.title: 85- Rory Scovel
episodes.summary: One of our favorite people, Rory Scovel, is back on the show! And he definitely brings the laughs!

episodes.title: 84- Almost Dr. Kevin Sousa
episodes.summary: It's a special bonus episode! With Todd, Daniel and special guest Dr. Kevin Sousa!

episodes.title: 83- New Year show!
episodes.summary: The first episode of 2013!

episodes.title: 82- Christmas Show part 2!
episodes.summary: Part of 2 our holiday show!

episodes.title: 81- Christmas Show!
episodes.summary: It's a very special Christmas episode just for YOU!

episodes.title: 80- Fred Stoller and Tom Martin
episodes.summary: It's another bonus episode! And this time it's with the hilarious Fred Stoller and our good friend Tom Martin! We have lots of fun cracking jokes, singing songs and talking about The Grove!

episodes.title: 79- Tom Martin
episodes.summary: Our friend Tom Martin can't get enough of the show! He returns for more bits, songs and craziness!

episodes.title: 78- Steve Lemme, Kevin Heffernan, Gary Gulman and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: A special bonus episode of The Todd Glass Show! Kevin Heffernan and Steve Lemme of Broken Lizard (Super Troopers, Beerfest) are on the show and they tell us stories, sing us songs and join us in some bits!

episodes.title: 77- Gary Gulman and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The wonderful Gary Gulman returns to the show! We figure out a Neil Diamond song, talk about how much fun we have and more!

episodes.title: 76- Daniel Kinno and David Feldman
episodes.summary: It's a VERY special episode featuring Daniel Kinno and the hilarious David Feldman. Listen to find out why!

episodes.title: 75- Jen Kirkman and Jake Fogelnest
episodes.summary: Jen Kirkman returns to the show and brings Jake Fogelnest with her! They're both avid listeners to our podcast, so they bring the bits, songs and more!

episodes.title: 74- Family Show
episodes.summary: It's another week of your favorite family!

episodes.title: 73- Family Show
episodes.summary: It's another show with our wonderful f#cked up family! Enjoy some more serious conversation followed by pure silliness!

episodes.title: 72- Family Show
episodes.summary: It's just the family on today's show, but damn, did we have FUN! The first hour we talk about some serious current issues like politics, but the second hour is ALL FUN!

episodes.title: 71- Doug Stanhope and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Doug Stanhope comes to BlackHorse Motors to hang out with us! Doug already knows all our songs, so we sing a few, talk about some current issues and more!

episodes.title: 70- Live at LA Podfest
episodes.summary: It's The Todd Glass Show LIVE from the LA podcast festival!

episodes.title: 69- Bonus episode with Paul F. Tompkins
episodes.summary: A special bonus and serious episode of the show! Todd and Paul F. Tompkins answer your emails and discuss some serious matters such as sexuality, society and politics.

episodes.title: 68- Family show
episodes.summary: Daniel is back from Malaysia, Eric tells a funny story about someone from the show, and we sing some of our favorite songs!

episodes.title: 67- Tom Martin
episodes.summary: We love Tom so much, we had him back for so more fun! And more bits, of course.

episodes.title: 66- Tom Martin
episodes.summary: Part two of the Tom Martin episode! Packed with even MORE bits, songs and fun!

episodes.title: 65- Tom Martin
episodes.summary: It's the first half of a two parter with Tom Martin! We do some improv, sing LOTS of songs and Tom has some very interesting facts he wants to share!

episodes.title: 64- Pete Holmes and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The always hilarious Pete Holmes is on the show! Pete shows off his singing voice, we take a call from Mark Wahlberg and more!

episodes.title: 63- Todd, Daniel and the gang
episodes.summary: It's just Todd, Daniel and the usual gang on the show this week, but don't worry, we had LOTS of fun! Bits, singing, dancing and more!

episodes.title: 62- Graham Elwood
episodes.summary: Graham Elwood returns to the show, along with his friend Libby! We also talk to Jerry Seinfeld and Todd and the gang sing Graham a very special song!

episodes.title: 61- Camping part 2
episodes.summary: It's part two of the camping/sleepover at Todd's! From when we went to sleep to when we woke up. And some jokes in between!

episodes.title: 60- Camping with Tommy Chong
episodes.summary: A special camping episode from....Todd's house! Todd, Daniel, Rory, Jordan, Blake, Chris, Eric, Mikey, Lynn,  Katie and special guest Tommy Chong sat around the fire and talked!

episodes.title: 59- Chelsea Peretti and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Chelsea Peretti returns to the show! We hear a scene from a new reality show, Lynn sings some songs, and we get another peak at The Home Shopping Channel!

episodes.title: 58- Live from Portland!
episodes.summary: It's the Todd Glass Show live from Heilum in Portland, Oregon!

episodes.title: 57- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno (and a special call-in guest!)
episodes.summary: Rory is back and, boy, is it a super fun show! Mark Wahlberg calls in, we see some interesting people walking outside, and Jordan gets on the mic again!

episodes.title: Memo about today's bonus episode
episodes.summary: Due to technical problems, today's bonus episode will not be released.

episodes.title: 56- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Our favorite guy named Rory is back! We sing some songs, Jordan gets on the mic and Daniel enlightens us with more Golden Girls facts!

episodes.title: 55- Greg Proops and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Greg Proops makes us laugh, then makes us laugh some and even makes us laugh more! There's infomercials, karaoke and more!

episodes.title: 54- Bonus Episode!
episodes.summary: Todd wants to discuss some more serious matters, so we're dropping a bonus episode with Daniel Kinno and Blake Wexler!

episodes.title: 53- Kulap Vilaysack and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: We're back at Blackhorse Motors and who better to have on the show than Kulap Vilaysack? She does some bits, sings some songs and makes us all laugh!

episodes.title: 52- Live from Indiana!
episodes.summary: It's the first live Todd Glass Show from The Comedy Attic in Bloomington, Indiana! Lots of fun with Todd, Geoff Tate and the fans!

episodes.title: 51- Best Of Episode
episodes.summary: It's a special best of episode! And don't worry, we only used the best parts.

episodes.title: 50- Todd and Daniel in Tahoe
episodes.summary: It's The Todd Glass Show from a hotel room in Lake Tahoe!

episodes.title: 49- Gary Gulman and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Gary Gulman returns to the show! We play some games, sing some songs and hear from Daniel's mom!

episodes.title: 48- A Super Serious Bonus Episode
episodes.summary: Todd and Daniel do a bonus episode to address some fan letters and talk about some important social and human rights issues.

episodes.title: 47- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno part two
episodes.summary: It's Rory and Daniel again! We hear some more songs, take a few more phone calls and Jordan won't stop stealing the mic...

episodes.title: 46- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: It's another two parter, and here is part one with Rory and Daniel! We also hear from Rory's fiance, Jordan. And some songs!

episodes.title: 45- Rory Scovel and Fake Problems (part 2)
episodes.summary: The wait is over! It's part two of Rory and Fake Problems! And guess what, there's more songs and bits!

episodes.title: 44- Rory Scovel and Fake Problems
episodes.summary: Rory Scovel comes back to the show along with the band Fake Problems. There's singing, bits and more phone calls!

episodes.title: 43- Henry Phillips, Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: It's double the fun with double the guests! Henry Phillips and Rory Scovel join Todd and Daniel to sing some songs, do some bits and take some calls!

episodes.title: 42- Brendon Walsh and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The hilarious Brendon Walsh is on the show! There's talk about pranks, politics and Brendon sings us a song!

episodes.title: 41- Eddie Pepitone and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Eddie Pepitone returns to the show! And he definitely brought the laughs. There are bits galore!

episodes.title: 40- Mike Koman and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Mike Koman returns to the show and he, Daniel and Todd talk about some stuff. And we all sing our favorite song again!

episodes.title: 39- Nick Thune and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The very tall and hilarious Nick Thune joins the show to sing some songs, Todd admits he has no rhythm and they talk about how annoying it is to rake leaves!

episodes.title: 38- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Rory Scovel is back on the show! We also find out that Daniel likes some embarrassing music and, of course, there's more bits!

episodes.title: Apology for lack of show this week
episodes.summary: Hey everyone, Todd is out of town and sick, so no new show this week. But he did want to say hi...

episodes.title: 37- James Adomian
episodes.summary: It's always fun when James Adomian is here! And this episode is no exception. Get ready for some bits!

episodes.title: 36- Bonus! Paul F. Tompkins
episodes.summary: It's a special bonus episode with Paul F. Tompkins. Things get real. Really real.

episodes.title: 35- Paul F. Tompkins
episodes.summary: Paul F. Tompkins returns to the show! Do you really need to know anything else?

episodes.title: 34- Geoff Tate and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The hilarious Geoff Tate was in town and stopped by to hang out with us! We talk about our favorite reality TV shows, sing a song about truckers and more!

episodes.title: 33- Jen Kirkman and Daniel Kinno (part 2)
episodes.summary: It's a follow up to last week's show and, yes, Jen Kirkman is really here. There are bits, songs and more bits!

episodes.title: 32- Jen Kirkman and Daniel Kinno (part 1)
episodes.summary: While waiting for Jen Kirkman to arrive, Daniel, Todd and Blake Wexler sing some songs and talk about some stuff!

episodes.title: 31- Paul F. Tompkins and Daniel Kinno (part 2)
episodes.summary: It's the long awaited (ok, only a week) second part of the Paul F. Tompkins and Daniel Kinno episode!

episodes.title: 30- Paul F. Tompkins and Daniel Kinno (part 1)
episodes.summary: Paul F. Tompkins joins Todd and Daniel. And so does the juice guy from Todd's gym.

episodes.title: 29- Rory Scovel and Mike Koman
episodes.summary: Rory and Mike come back for more laughs. There's bits, music, bits, and more!

episodes.title: 28- Anthony Jeselnik and Jonah Ray
episodes.summary: Todd starts out the podcast to discuss the week with Sarah Silverman. Then Anthony Jeselnik and Jonah Ray come by to hang out, do some bits and talk some shit.

episodes.title: 27- Chelsea Peretti and Bobby Miyamoto
episodes.summary: The always hilarious Chelsea Peretti hangs out with Todd and Bobby Miyamoto to sell some gifts on a home shopping network, talk about Toddlers and Tiaras and more!

episodes.title: 26- Jimmy Pardo and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Jimmy Pardo drops by to debate music, talk cellphone etiquette, allergies and more!

episodes.title: 25- Andy Kindler and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The always hilarious Andy Kindler joins Todd and Daniel to talk singing, comedy and more!

episodes.title: 24- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Rory Scovel joins Todd and Daniel to help bring in the holidays! There's bits, songs, meowing and much more!

episodes.title: 23- Demetri Martin and Mike Koman
episodes.summary: Demetri Martin and Mike Koman sit down with us to talk about being hit on, tattle-tales, and their memories of Sharpie markers!

episodes.title: 22- Jimmy Dore and Mike Koman
episodes.summary: Jimmy Dore and Mike Koman join the show to talk Rodney Dangerfield, jingles and political jokes.

episodes.title: 21- Shannon Lee, Child Therapist
episodes.summary: It's the bonus episode with child therapist, Shannon Lee. She comes on to discuss the topic of spanking with Todd.

episodes.title: 20- Rory Scovel and Norm MacDonald
episodes.summary: It's a bonus episode! Norm MacDonald hangs around for a bit more and Rory joins us for some super fun times. There are bits, bits and more bits!

episodes.title: 19- Norm MacDonald
episodes.summary: Norm MacDonald comes on the show and makes the whole Blackhorse Motors roar with laughter. We talk song lyrics, interviewing techniques, Richard Nixon and much more!

episodes.title: 18- Sarah Silverman, Kyle Dunnigan and a special guest!
episodes.summary: The wonderful and hilarious Sarah Silverman and Kyle Dunnigan join the show for some festive music, ice cream and surprise dance numbers. And a special guest pops in for a few minutes!

episodes.title: 17- James Adomian
episodes.summary: The always hilarious James Adomian joins us for an extra long episode! James does some of his amazing impersonations and talks about sketch comedy, angry old people and more. But he definitely does not talk about the weather.

episodes.title: 16- Henry Phillips returns
episodes.summary: Henry Phillips returns to the show to sing a few more songs, tell the story of the worst intro he ever had and Todd really wants to see you eat a grilled cheese sandwich.

episodes.title: 15- Graham Elwood and Bobby Miyamoto
episodes.summary: Bobby Miyamoto joins the show and Graham Elwood returns for some more character bits, singing and political discussion.

episodes.title: 14- Rory Scovel
episodes.summary: Todd, Daniel and Rory start the show a few times, discuss the etiquette of ordering lobster on a date and we are joined by a few fans!

episodes.title: 13- Tom Wilson
episodes.summary: The multi-talented Tom Wilson comes to the show to talk about his early days of comedy, bad auditions and we get to hear what Todd's voice really sounds like.

episodes.title: 12- Gary Gulman
episodes.summary: The extremely hilarious and tall Gary Gulman is on the show to make some very inappropriate jokes, tell prison stories, and Blake gets very angry. Again.

episodes.title: 11- Mike Koman
episodes.summary: Todd's old friend and roommate, Mike Koman, comes on the show to discuss the proper etiquette for living with roommates, recent political events and more!

episodes.title: 10- Graham Elwood
episodes.summary: This week we are joined by the wonderful Graham Elwood for some singing, stories from back in the day and characters. Make sure to stick around for the very special and intimate aftershow.

episodes.title: 9- Kevin Farley
episodes.summary: Kevin Farley stops by the shop for some sing-alongs, family storytelling and more!

episodes.title: 8- Rory Scovel aftershow
episodes.summary: It's the bonus episode of the aftershow with Rory Scovel!

episodes.title: 7- Rory Scovel returns!
episodes.summary: Rory Scovel missed us so much he came back for more! We take a few phone calls, discuss free bread at The Olive Garden and Rory helps us deal with our noisy neighbors.

episodes.title: 6- Chris Hardwick
episodes.summary: Our favorite boss Chris Hardwick joined the show and we're so excited we are releasing the episode early as a bonus! We talk about podcasting, comedy and trumpet playing.

episodes.title: 5- Eddie Pepitone
episodes.summary: Eddie Pepitone joins the show to tell us about his secret meditation secret and sings some karaoke!

episodes.title: 4- Henry Phillips aftershow
episodes.summary: It's the extra long aftershow from last week! Henry and Daniel are still here and Henry sings a few songs.

episodes.title: 3- Henry Phillips and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: The very talented Henry Phillips joins Todd and Daniel and we get a few phones calls...

episodes.title: 2- Rory Scovel and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: Rory Scovel joins the show and Daniel Kinno is back for seconds on this week's episode of The Todd Glass Show!

episodes.title: 1- Tom Martin and Daniel Kinno
episodes.summary: It's the first episode of The Todd Glass Show and friends Tom Martin and Daniel Kinno are here! Make sure to stick around for the aftershow...
